comments.author: Alistair ryan.7562
comments.body:
Am I the only person that believes that the characters should change to swimwear upon entering the water ?
The idea came to me as I did one of the diving achievement locations and my character reverted to the default underwear. then I thought about all the charr in heavy armor swimming at the bottom of the sea and how heavy that must be. it would make sense to me if the characters had special diving suits that they wore when they entered the water rather than armor that they wear on land.
